This one fixed:

> `@@||ebay.com^$jsinject,elemhide,extension` + `@@||ebay.com^$stealth` 

All other alone failed.

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 트레이 메뉴에 있는 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ww2.m4ufree.com/watch-peakyblinders-15229-tvshow-online-free-m4ufree.html

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener

_No response_

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ww2.m4ufree.com/watch-peakyblinders-15229-tvshow-online-free-m4ufree.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>Check the attached video to see how to reproduce. You have to select #Q-F or #F in the media player window.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29574622/214794990-c217d577-0f46-4a58-b396-a3a946bdbedd.mp4

</details>



### Privacy

issue.title: irecommend.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://irecommend.ru/#best](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Firecommend.ru%2F%23best) ### Comment > Здравствуйте. Не блокируется Яндекс реклама. Всеми сервисами и поиском Яндекса не пользуюсь. Есть аналоги. Я хочу полностью заблокировать весь Яндекс, кинопоиск, все его сервисы вместе с рекламой. Чтобы всё это не открывалось во всех браузерах. На уровне операционной системы. Штатным фаерволом. У меня Windows 10. С последствиями совершения моих действий согласен. Домены: dzen.ru yandex.ru yastatic.net / Заблокировал IP: 5.255.255.5 5.255.255.50 5.255.255.55 5.255.255.60 62.217.160.2 77.88.55.66 77.88.55.70 77.88.55.77 77.88.55.80 178.154.131.215-178.154.131.217 / Какие ещё домены? Спасибо. ### Screenshots

* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://news.sky.com/story/teams-and-outlook-goes-down-for-thousands-of-microsoft-users-12794856

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener

_No response_
